mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '').lower()
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '').lower()
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 != sorted_s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.replace('', '').lower()
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '').lower()
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', 'MUTATED').lower()
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', '').lower()
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '').lower()
    s2 = s2.replace('', '').lower()
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.replace(' ', '').lower()
    s2 = s2.replace(' ', 'MUTATED').lower()
    sorted_s1 = sorted(s1)
    sorted_s2 = sorted(s2)
    return sorted_s1 == sorted_s2
